title: The Sisters - The Sorority Rapport (2013) (scanlation) (Alice)
description:
English | CBZ | 46 Pages

The Sisters: The Sorority Rapport
Publisher:  Bamboo Edition
Publication Date:  

Story:  Christophe Cazenove and William Maury
Art and Colors:  William Maury
Translation:  Alice

Wendy, is my big sister.  I'm the little sister.  If you'd have asked me, I would prefer to be the older sister.  I'll never know what it feels like to have a little sister who does everything exactly like me.  Who tries to open the lock on my diary, listening at my door when I talk about boys with my best friends, stealing my clothes from behind my back, and cutting out pictures from my favorite magazines.  In fact, I would have liked to be my own sister, just for the chance to have me as my sister!

The Sisters is a series of comics which tells the story of two sisters, Wendy and Marine.  William based the two main characters on his own two daughters, Wendy (15 years, but 11 years in the comic) and Marine (11 years, 6 years but in the comic).
